item.title: Live Share in Visual Studio Code
item.description: The Visual Studio Code (VS Code) Live Share extension provides a great way to collaborate on code whilst working from home. Assuming read/write access is enabled, you and your team mates can edit code, highlight sections of it, save it, and run it in real-time. Just bear in mind that when code is run, it is run locally, which means you won’t have access to any objects that aren’t in your own environment or datasets that aren’t on your own machine.
